overview:
Mindy Davis oversees client services at House Party, where she is responsible for the strategic development and implementation of all client campaigns.

An expert in direct-to-consumer outreach, Mindy has over 20 years experience driving strategic marketing campaigns and new product development efforts.

Before joining House Party in 2007, Mindy was instrumental in driving new business initiatives for Kraft Foods. She led expansion of the Gevalia coffee brand, including its entry into the Hispanic market, and created a new wine continuity program, 600 Grapes.

Prior to Kraft, Mindy held a series of senior marketing positions at BMG Direct, American Family Publishers and Book-of-the-Month Club.

Mindy has B.S. in Business Administration from the State University of New York at Albany and an MBA from Columbia University.

degrees.subject: Business Administration
degrees.institution: State University of New York at Albany
